TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ExceptionHandlingRetryResult extends Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.Client.ExceptionHandlingResult
Public NotInheritable Class ExceptionHandlingRetryResult Inherits ExceptionHandlingResult

Docs.summary: Specifies the exception handling result when the request from client to service can be retried

MemberSignature.Value: public ExceptionHandlingRetryResult (Exception exception, bool isTransient, Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.Client.OperationRetrySettings retrySettings, int maxRetryCount);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Exception exception, bool isTransient, class Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.Client.OperationRetrySettings retrySettings, int32 maxRetryCount) cil managed

Docs.param: The exception that needs to be retried.

Indicates if this is a transient retriable exception. Transient retriable exceptions are those where the communication channel from client to service still exists. Non transient retriable exceptions are those where we need to re-resolve the service endpoint before we retry.
The retrySettings from which the interval to wait before retrying is figured out.
The maximum number of times the exception identified by the exceptionId parameter needs to be retried for.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public ExceptionHandlingRetryResult (Exception exception, bool isTransient, TimeSpan retryDelay, int maxRetryCount);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Exception exception, bool isTransient, valuetype System.TimeSpan retryDelay, int32 maxRetryCount) cil managed

Docs.param: The exception that needs to be retried.

Indicates if this is a transient retriable exception. Transient retriable exceptions are those where the communication channel from client to service still exists. Non transient retriable exceptions are those where we need to re-resolve the service endpoint before we retry.
The interval to wait before retrying
The maximum number of times the exception given in the exception parameter needs to be retried for.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public ExceptionHandlingRetryResult (string exceptionId, bool isTransient, TimeSpan retryDelay, int maxRetryCount);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string exceptionId, bool isTransient, valuetype System.TimeSpan retryDelay, int32 maxRetryCount) cil managed
Public Sub New (exceptionId As String, isTransient As Boolean, retryDelay As TimeSpan, maxRetryCount As Integer)

Docs.param: An identifier for the exception that needs to be retried.

Indicates if this is a transient retriable exception. Transient retriable exceptions are those where the communication channel from client to service still exists. Non transient retriable exceptions are those where we need to re-resolve the service endpoint before we retry.
The interval to wait before retrying
The maximum number of times the exception identified by the exceptionId parameter needs to be retried for.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ExceptionId As String

Docs.summary: Gets string that uniquely identifies the exception type.
Docs.value: Unique id for this exception. This id is used to keep track of the number of times this exception is retried

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsTransient As Boolean

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the exception is represents a transient condition. The transient retriable exceptions are those where the communication channel from client to service still exists. Non transient retriable exceptions are those where we need to re-resolve the service endpoint before we retry.
Docs.value: true indicates that this is a transient retriable exception. false indicates that this is a non transient retriable exception.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MaxRetryCount As Integer

Docs.summary: Gets maximum number of times this exception type needs to be retried before giving up. The default value is int.MaxValue

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RetryDelay As TimeSpan

Docs.summary: Gets the time interval after which the operation should be retried.
Docs.value: Time delay after which the operation should be retried
